_A_ALERT_GROUP_BTN_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_: The AAlert component allows the developer to customize various aspects of the notification, including the close button. By using the "btnCloseAttributes" prop, the properties of the close button can be changed.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_BTN_CLOSE_HEADER_: AAlert component with customizable close button
_A_ALERT_GROUP_CLOSABLE_DESCRIPTION_: The parameter :closable="true" adds a close function for the component.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_CLOSABLE_FROM_OUTSIDE_DES: The parameter :closable-from-outside="true" allows you to control the closing of the component from the outside.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_CSS_DESCRIPTION_: You can change the appearance of individual elements in the component.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The parameter html allows you to display HTML. The content will be sanitized.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_ICONS_CUSTOM_DESCRIPTION_: The parameter icon allows you to display any icon.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The content of the component can be specified in HTML format using the safe-html parameter. This content is considered safe and will not be sanitized.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_SLOT_DESCRIPTION_: Instead of an html parameter html, you can use a slot default.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: The content of the component can be specified in Plain Text format using the text parameter.
_A_ALERT_GROUP_TYPES_DESCRIPTION_: Displays the component in a different color scheme.
_A_ALERT_PROPS_BTN_CLOSE_ATTRIBUTES_DESC: An object that defines the properties of the close button.
_A_ALERT_PROPS_HAS_ICON_DESCRIPTION_: Whether a type icon is displayed
_A_ALERT_PROPS_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: HTML to be shown inside the component
_A_ALERT_PROPS_ICON_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: Additional CSS class for the icon
_A_ALERT_PROPS_ICON_DESCRIPTION_: Icon. Any icon available for the AIcon component can be used
_A_ALERT_PROPS_REMOVE_ALERT_ON_CLOSE_DES: Controlling the closure of an alert from outside a component
_A_ALERT_PROPS_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: Safe HTML to be shown inside the component
_A_ALERT_PROPS_TEXT_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_: The text for the close button to be read by the screen reader
_A_ALERT_PROPS_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: Plain Text to be shown inside the component
